forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 58F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain early. Partial clearing late. Thunder possible. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with rain early...then becoming partly cloudy. Thunder possible. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High around 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 58F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 8C. NW winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low near 45F. NW winds at 10 to 20 mph, decreasing to less than 5 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 16C. E winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 61F. E winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 47F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 15C. S winds at 10 to 15 km/h, increasing to 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 59F. S winds at 5 to 10 mph, increasing to 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 60F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
